from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import ListItem def Load(widget): entity = widget.Entity entity.Fields["DESTINO"] = ListItem(1, "Veiculo") entity.Fields["FILTRO"] = False
widget.View.FieldDefinitions["FILTRO"].Visible = False widget.View.FieldDefinitions["DESTINO"].Visible = False
